name: Corrupt Space
description:
Controls

WASD Move
Mouse Left Click Interact

---

Corrupt Space is a spooky puzzle game. 👻

This jam's theme is Running out of space, and in this game, the environment shrinks when you're not looking 👀 

Not only was this was my first LD, it was my first game jam ever. It was great fun and I've learned a lot!
I spent a lot of the time experimenting and learning about Unity so the game doesn't last too long.

It was a solo jam and all graphics and code were created by myself during the jam.

Thanks for playing! 👍
